name: Scrap Collector
description:
This is the second entry in our 2023 one-game-per-month challenge!

In this game you play as a new Scrap Collector, and it's your job to ... collect scrap! Fly through 3 precarious levels, avoiding asteroids, unlocking doors, and collecting scrap. 

Please be aware that, as this is the output of a single-month's worth of work, there are already a few known bugs - but none of them are game-breaking. This game is not in active development, and this release should be thought of as pre-alpha. 

Despite that, we had a lot of fun developing this little game, and we hope you get some enjoyment out of playing it.

Known Bugs:
  • Sprite layering in some levels
  • GUI scaling at very large, or very small resolutions

Like what we're doing? Check out our website: https://atomiccd.com/

Tips:
  • You can carry multiple scrap at a time, so it's not always necessary to continuously return to the depot
  • Beware of the asteroids
  • Do a good job, or you'll be replaced by Petey!
